scripts.build: npm run extensions:build && npm run sass:build
scripts.dev: npm run sass:dev && npm run js:dev
scripts.extensions:build: wp-scripts build src/block-extensions/menu-behaviour.js src/block-extensions/column.js src/block-extensions/buttons.js src/block-extensions/media-text.js --output-path=build/block-extensions
scripts.extensions:dev: wp-scripts start src/block-extensions/menu-behaviour.js src/block-extensions/column.js src/block-extensions/buttons.js src/block-extensions/media-text.js --output-path=build/block-extensions
